title: DEFENSE OF MINAS TIRITH - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Gondor is outnumbered and outmatched.  But yet they have to hold against the forces of Mordor and Isengard.  Will Minas Tirith fall to the darkness of Middle Earth!  Enjoy the Battle!  

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

----------------------------------How You Can Support Me! ------------------------------------

- Like, share and leave a comment :D
- Turn OFF adblock or whitelist my channel
- Send me a GREAT battle Replay: pixelatedapollo@gmail.com
